Name: Vatrata
Comment: Vatrata is an exonym that has never been used by the communities themselves, and it actually corresponds to two distict language communities, Lemerig and Vera'a. Tryon mentions Leon, Pak, and Sasar as alternate names -- the latter has been recorded as a separate language (a dialect of Vera's), the former two are varieties of Lemerig, hence the linking.

Name: Sasar
Comment: Sasar is listed as dialect of Vera'a

Name: Dorig
Comment: Glottolog lists Dorig and Wetamut as alternate names for the same language.

Name: Wetamut
Comment: Glottolog lists Dorig and Wetamut as alternate names for the same language.
